ARABIC: وَيَوْمَ يُنَادِيهِمْ فَيَقُولُ مَاذَآ أَجَبْتُمُ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: On the Day when He summons them He will say, 'How did you respond to the Messengers?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (God) will ask them on that day: "What answer did you give the apostles?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (Let them not disregard) that the Day when Allah will call out to them saying: "What was the answer you gave to the Messengers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: On the day when God will call them and ask them, "What answer did you give to (Our) messengers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And on the Day when He will call to them and proclaim, “What answer did you give to the Noble Messengers?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And the Day He will call to them, and say: "What answer gave you to the Messengers"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And on the day when He shall call them and say: What was the answer you gave to the apostles?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon the day when He shall call to them, and He shall say, 'What answer gave you to the Envoys?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And on the Day when He will call unto them and say: What answer gave ye to the messengers?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: On that Day God will call out to them, saying, "What answer did you give to Our messengers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And on the Day whereon He shall call unto them and say: what answer gave ye to the sent ones?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The day He will call out to them and say, ‘What response did you give to the apostles?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: That Day (Allah) will call to them, and say: "What was the answer ye gave to the messengers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And (remember) the Day (Allah) will call to them, and say: "What answer gave you to the Messengers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: On that Day He will call to them and He will say: 'What response did you give Our Messengers'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: On the Day when He will call to them, and say, “What did you answer the Messengers?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And [mention] the Day He will call them and say, "What did you answer the messengers?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [28:65] And, mention, the day when He will call to them and say, ‘What response did you give to those [messengers] who were sent?’, to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And on the Day) of Judgement (when He will call unto them) Allah will call unto the disbelievers (and say: What answer gave ye to the messengers) regarding that for which they invited you?
